message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $11000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $10500? I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to 11200. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
